page.title: 03A Market Gardener's Day
page.content: {He got up at 5am}to shoot rabbits.He gave the rabbits to a friend for his ferrets.At{6am}he prepared orders for Superior's canteen and for Pathfinder House.At{9am}he had a breakfast of bacon and egg, toast and tea.His cat had some of his bacon.Next he rotavated some land ready to set lettuce and runner beans.He had dinner at{1pm}of baked potatoes, beef, cabbage and carrots and ice-cream for afters. Between lunch and tea he set the lettuce and beans.For tea at 5pm he had bread and cheese,cake and two cups of tea.Then he rotavated between his swedes which are two feet apart. He finished work{at 8 o'clock}and then went in and spent the evening with his family.He went to bed at about{11 {o'clock.
